name: Late Risers
text:
Easy / Standard
[skull]: -X. X is your distance from Lab Omega. (Lab Omega is 0, Morgue is 1...)
[cultist]: -3. If you succeed, you may remove a barricade from an adjacent location.
[tablet]: -2. If you fail, move one location towards Lab Omega.
back_text:
Hard / Expert
[skull]: -X. X is twice your distance from Lab Omega. (Lab Omega is 0, Morgue is 2...)
[cultist]: -6. If you succeed, you may remove a barricade from an adjacent location.
[tablet]: -3. After this test resolves, move one location towards Lab Omega.

flavor: Was it your imagination, or did the corpse on the slab just twitch?
name: Lab Delta
text: [reaction] When you investigate this location: Increase its shroud level by 4 for this investigation. If you succeed, investigators at this location may spend 3[per_investigator] clues, as a group, to put the set-aside Ripped Hallway location into play.
back_flavor: Peering through the barricades, you can spot several inexplicable devices and something that looks like a cadaver

flavor: While searching the case for something of value, you prick yourself on a needle within. You quickly pull your hand back, and find a glowing green liquid entering your veins. Your head spins, and your vision goes black for a moment. When you can see again, everything is tinged with a red haze. You feel an intense desire to break something, or someone. You can only hope that this anger will fade with time.
name: Fire in the Veins
text: - Record in your campaign log that "*your investigator* has injected a cardinal reagant". - Exile Suspicious Briefcase. Any investigator who has not "injected a cardinal reagant" may add it to their deck (Does not count towards deck size). That investigator immediately puts Suspicious Briefcase into play.

flavor: The reagants carried within are oddly luminescent.
name: Suspicious Briefcase
text: [fast] Exhaust Suspicious Briefcase and reveal a random chaos token from the chaos bag: Gain 3 resources. If you revealed a [skull], [tablet], or [auto_fail], flip this card over and resolve its story text. Forced - If Suspicious Briefcase would leave play or you would be defeated: Exile Suspicious Briefcase.

name: Night on the Town
text: Easy / Standard [skull]: -X. X is the number of locations with Survivors. [cultist]: -4. If you succeed, draw 1 card and gain 1 resource. [tablet]: -3. If you fail, draw the topmost [[Miasma]] treachery from the discard pile.
back_text: Hard / Expert [skull]: -X. X is the number of locations with a Ruin or Survivors. [cultist]: -6. If you succeed, draw 1 card and gain 1 resource. [tablet]: -3. Draw the topmost [[Miasma]] treachery from the discard pile.

flavor: "We haveta look out for each other, eh friend?"
name: Hibbs
text:
You get +1 [willpower] and +1 [agility].
[reaction] When an investigator at your location would take an attack of opportunity, exhaust Hibbs: Cancel that attack.

name: Dead by Dawn
text:
Easy / Standard
[skull]: -X. X is the greatest damage on a [[Re-Animated]] enemy in play (max 5).
[cultist]: -3. If you succeed, deal 1 damage to any [[Re-Animated]] enemy in play.
[tablet]: -2. If you fail, ready the nearest exhausted [[Re-Animated]] enemy.
back_text:
Hard / Expert
[skull]: -X. X is 2+ the greatest damage on a [[Re-Animated]] enemy in play (max 5).
[cultist]: -5. If you succeed, deal 1 damage to any [[Re-Animated]] enemy in play.
[tablet]: -3. If you fail, ready the nearest exhausted [[Re-Animated]] enemy.

name: Herbert West
text:
You get +1 [intellect].
[reaction] When an enemy would be defeated at your location, exhaust Herbert West: Instead, heal 2 damage from that enemy. Then, discover 2 clues at your location.

name: Death's Hold
text: Revelation - Take 2 direct horror. This horror cannot be prevented.

name: The Folly of Man
text: Revelation - Take 2 direct damage. This damage cannot be prevented.

name: Strength of Flesh
text:
Permanent. Cannot leave play.
[reaction] After you succeed at a skill test where a [skull] token was revealed, exhaust Strength of Flesh: Heal all damage from Strength of Flesh.

name: Unbreakable Will
text: [reaction] After you succeed at a skill test where a [cultist] token was revealed, exhaust Unbreakable Will: Heal all damage from Unbreakable Will.

name: Mourning Chorus
text: Easy / Standard [skull]: -X. X is the highest number of doom on an enemy in play (max 4). [cultist]: -3. (-5 if you are at a [[Miasma]] location). If you succeed, place 1 resource on your location (from the token pool). [tablet]: -3. If you fail, place 1 resource on the current agenda (from the token pool). This effect may cause the Procession to move.
back_text: Hard / Expert [skull]: -X. X is 1 greater than the highest number of doom on an enemy in play (max 6). [cultist]: -4 (-6 if you are at a [[Miasma]] location). If you succeed, place 1 resource on your location (from the token pool). [tablet]: -3. Place 1 resource on the current agenda (from the token pool). This effect may cause the Procession to move.

flavor: If it's worth doing, its worth overdoing.
name: Excessive Spirits
text: [reaction] After you succeed by 3 or more at a skill test during an action on your turn, exhaust Excessive Spirits: You may take an additional action this turn, which can only be used on the same type of action used to trigger this effect.

name: Extended Loan
text: Forced - When your turn begins: Place 2 resources (from the token pool) on this card. Resources on this card may be spent as if they were in your resource pool. Discard all resources from this card at the end of your turn.

name: Handshake Deal
text:
The first asset you play each round costs 1 fewer resource.
[action] Remove Handshake Deal from the game: Play an asset from your hand or discard pile, ignoring its resource cost.

flavor: If you have Ma's thumbs up, all of Arkham's on your side.
name: Ma's Approval
text:
[reaction] When you play an [[Ally]] asset: Discard any cards attached to Ma's Approval and attach that asset to this card.
Attached asset takes up no [[Ally]] slots and gets +1 health and +1 sanity.

flavor: "Now, I am lending you this on a purely provisional basis, you understand."
name: Reliquary Tome
text:
Your maximum hand size is increased by 4.
[action] Exhaust Reliquary Tome: Draw 2 cards.

name: Ritual of Yaztaroth
text: Forced - After Ritual of Yaztaroth enters play: Place 1 horror on it. [reaction] When you would spend a charge or secret on an asset you control, exhaust Ritual of Yaztaroth: Heal 1 horror from Ritual of Yaztaroth instead.

name: Full Coverage
text:
Fast. Play only during your turn.
For the remainder of the round, each event you play gets -1 cost and gains "Draw 1 card." Draw 1 card.

name: Hard Days Work
text: You may only commit Hard Day's Work as an exact copy of any skill in your discard pile or as an exact copy of another card committed to this skill test, and it gains Hard Day's Work's icons in addition to its own.

name: High Noon Descent
text: Easy / Standard [skull]: -X. X is the number of locations you are away from The Saferoom. [cultist]: -4. If you succeed, you may move to a connecting location. [tablet]: -2. If you fail, place 1 clue on your location (from the token bank). [elder_thing]: -3. If you fail, each investigator who has Heeded the Call must spend 1 clue or take 1 horror.
back_text: Hard / Expert [skull]: -X. X is 2 plus the number of locations you are away from The Saferoom. [cultist]: -5. If you succeed, you may move to a connecting location. [tablet]: -4. If you fail, place 1 clue on your location (from the token bank). [elder_thing]: -3. For each point you fail by, each investigator who has Heeded the Call must spend 1 clue or take 1 horror.

flavor: Something watches you through the window whenever you avert your gaze.
name: The Left Artery
text: Forced - After you start your turn at this location: Take 1 direct horror.
back_flavor: An unsettling glow, like light through water, comes from deeper in the Omega Wing...

name: Agent Greyson
text:
You get +1 [intellect] and +1 [combat].
[reaction] After your turn ends, spend 1 resource: Move an investigator at your location to a connecting location.

name: The Afternoon War
text: Easy / Standard [skull]: -X. X is the most damage or horror on a location (max 4). [cultist]: -4. If you succeed, you may return 1 token from your location to the token bank. [tablet]: -2. If you fail, you cannot trigger the [action] ability on the act for the remainder of the round. [elder_thing]: -3. If you fail, each investigator who has Heeded the Call must place 1 horror or 1 damage on their location.
back_text: Hard / Expert [skull]: -X. X is the most damage or horror on a location (max 6). [cultist]: -5. If you succeed, you may return 1 token from your location to the token bank. [tablet]: -3. If you fail, you cannot trigger the [action] ability on the act for the remainder of the round. [elder_thing]: -3. If you fail, each investigator who has Heeded the Call must place 1 horror or 1 damage on their location for each point you failed by.

name: Death at Sundown
text: Easy / Standard [skull]: -X. X is the [[Floor]] of your location. [cultist]: -5. If you succeed, you may immediately discover a clue from any revealed location. [tablet]: -2. If you fail, move the Tendrils of the First one location towards you. [elder_thing]: -3. If you fail, each investigator who has Heeded the Call must move one location towards the First Among Many.
back_text: Hard / Expert [skull]: -X. X is 2 greater than the [[Floor]] of your location. [cultist]: -7. If you succeed, you may immediately discover a clue from any revealed location. [tablet]: -4. If you fail, move the Tendrils of the First one location towards you. [elder_thing]: -3. If you fail, each investigator who has Heeded the Call must move one location towards the First Among Many for each point you failed by.

name: The Midnight Hour
text: Easy / Standard [skull]: -X. X is the number of locations with horror on them (max 4). [cultist]: -4. If you succeed, deal 1 damage to any enemy in play or discover 1 clue from any location in play. [tablet]: -4. If you fail, move once towards the nearest [[Miasma]] location. [elder_thing]: -3. If you fail, each investigator who has Heeded the Call must resolve the Forced ability on each [[Miasma]] location as if they had started their turn there.
back_text: Hard / Expert [skull]: -X. X is the number of locations with horror on them. [cultist]: -6. If you succeed, deal 1 damage to any enemy in play or discover 1 clue from any location in play. [tablet]: -4. After this test ends, move once towards the nearest [[Miasma]] location. [elder_thing]: -3. If you fail, each investigator who has Heeded the Call must resolve the Forced ability on each [[Miasma]] location as if they had started their turn there.

name: Messenger of the Flame
text: Forced - At the start of the enemy phase, if Messenger of the Flame is at a Miasma location without horror: Defeat that location. Otherwise, move Messenger of the Flame once towards the nearest Miasma location without horror. [action] If it is not act 1, the investigators spend 3[per_investigator] clues, as a group: Parley. Out of desperation, you seek a bargain with Cthugha. Flip this card and resolve its story text.

name: Feed the Flame
text: text text
